attributes.title: No Thank You.
attributes.review: It asked for information and kept sending notifications to vote for Trump. I’m sorry but the app was disturbing me by sending me a bunch of notifications.. I did NOT like that.

attributes.title: I still need my food
attributes.review: So I thought I should get the app because the orange man looked like something that would be sold in ihop but this man is trying to het me to vote and it is not the worst part I found muffins in my freezer after getting the app and the fridge oven stove and microwave ran away so I could not eat Mac n cheese the orange man is not helping me I’m very hungry

attributes.title: Buggy
attributes.review: I am suspicious of this app and the unadvertised actions it undertakes on my device. I have deleted the app, out of an “abundance of caution.”

attributes.title: Please dont download
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because i wanted a dog but my parents said no, then it took a WHOLE YEAR to download. I thought it was gonna be worth is but wasnt. a girl hopped out my phone 📱 and stole my bath, toilet, and even my sink😡😤. the worst part is she wasnt even cute and then when i caught her she just looked at me like 👁👄👁 like the 🤡 she was. the i went to wendys to get food at it.was.closed. but i needed my food because i was hungry and didnt know how to cook but then my mom gave me donuts 🍩 🥰😍 and now im not hungry anymore. and then i saw the girl again and she had my toilet 🚽 and then she hit me but i beat a girl up 😤😤.
